briefTitle: Phase 3 Study of Cx601 in Participants With Complex Perianal Fistulising Crohn's Disease
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Multicenter, Open-Label, Uncontrolled Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Cx601 in the Treatment of Complex Perianal Fistulas in Adult Patients With Crohn's Disease
conditions: Complex Perianal Fistulas in Adult Participants With Crohn's Disease
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of darvadstrocel for the treatment of complex perianal fistulas in adult participants with Crohn's disease over 24 weeks.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Combined Remission of Perianal Fistulising Crohn's Disease (CD) at Week 24
